name: in/deSYNC
description:
Two bodies. Two environments. One soul.

Made by Sam Wallach and Hamza Khan, in/deSYNC is a puzzle-platformer wherein you control two characters at the same time with the same inputs, trying to navigate levels while keeping them both alive. This game was made for the GMTK2021 game jam with the theme "Joined Together".

Controls:

- Arrow keys to move
- Space bar to jump (hold to jump higher)
